data.name: As simple as it could get
data.detailed_description: As simple as it could get is a survival game where you're in a harsh world with friends and foes as well as make a story you can the good route or bad. We will update this game a lot, and it will have events and patches fixing bugs and more we will update our servers and more and ask you guys for ideas See you in game very soon we will all be waiting for you there.
data.about_the_game: As simple as it could get is a survival game where you're in a harsh world with friends and foes as well as make a story you can the good route or bad. We will update this game a lot, and it will have events and patches fixing bugs and more we will update our servers and more and ask you guys for ideas See you in game very soon we will all be waiting for you there.
data.short_description: Survive this harsh world in a survival game where you make friends and also complete the story of the game we will see you in game soon.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel core i5-2500
  • Memory: 500 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel UHD Graphics 630
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 600 MB available space
  • Sound Card: High Definition Audio Device
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel core i5-11600K
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel UHD Graphics 630
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 600 MB available space
  • Sound Card: High Definition Audio Device

content_descriptors.notes: This game has Fantasy Violence and gore. If you do not like this type of stuff please do not play this game
